content: fairy glen socks caroline hegwer fairy glen socks *before you start* the fairy glen socks are a fun easy sock pattern with addictive repeats the color and stitch changes will make you want to knit just a little more to get to the next section with an easy afterthought heel construction the knitting will feel like it is flowing sizes 1 2 3 4 foot circumference at widest point 8 9 10 11 yarn the noble thread fairy glen kit a 1 the noble thread amelie 75% sw merino 25% nylon 231 yards/ 50g skein b-e 1 each of the noble thread amelie mini 75% sw merino 25% nylon 87 yards/ 20g skein needles 9 us1 5 or us1 5 dpns or 40 us1 5 for magic loop method note the pattern is written for 9 needles if using the magic loop or dpns you might have to shift your stitches from one needle to the other
